user.title: Select street address and number
user.description: Include house- number and letter (if applicable) to narrow the search results. The entries in the result is automatically limited by the API.

select_address.title: Select street address and number
select_address.description: The list of entries might be limited if you didn't specify your house number and/or letter.

select_fractions.title: Select fractions
select_fractions.description: You can select multiple fractions. Leave empty to select all fractions at once.

error.invalid_address: Invalid address or not found in MinRenovasjon
error.fractions_not_found: Fractions not found for given address/municipality.
